newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Corn, soybeans and wheat steady.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Corn, soybeans and wheat steady.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf corn, soybean and winter wheat basis values were unchanged with lower CBOT futures prices discouraging sales into FOB markets, grain dealers said.
Dealers said demand was light for FOB grain and soybeans at the U.S. Gulf thus offsetting the impact of slowed grain and soybean movement.
Taiwan was scheduled to tender Tuesday and Wednesday for a total of 113,000 tonnes of U.S. wheat including hard red winter, spring wheat and soft white wheat for June to August shipment.
SOYBEANS (No. 2 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu)
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
LH May unq + N nc +25 + N unc
FH June unq + N nc +26 + N unc
LH June unq + N nc +27 + N unc
July unq + N nc +27 + N unc
August unq + N nc +54 + Q unc
Note: N=CBOT July, Q=CBOT August, nc=no comparison

-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
Spot unq nc +45 + N unc

July unq nc +15 + N unc
HRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis KCBT, cts/bu) -

((Chicago newsdesk 312-408-8720))
